Description.enUS: Energy-manipulator unit. Can use Force Field, Guardian Shield, and Hallucination.**Can attack ground and air units**
Description.ruRU: Energy-manipulator unit. Can use Force Field, Guardian Shield, and Hallucination.**Can attack ground and air units**

Tooltip.enUS: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Tooltip.ruRU: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.

Tooltip.enUS: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Tooltip.ruRU: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.

Tooltip.enUS: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Tooltip.ruRU: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.

Tooltip.enUS: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Tooltip.ruRU: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.

Tooltip.enUS: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Tooltip.ruRU: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.

Tooltip.enUS: Sends constructed units to the designated point. Workers rallied to resources will begin gathering automatically.
Tooltip.ruRU: Sends constructed units to the designated point. Workers rallied to resources will begin gathering automatically.

Tooltip.enUS: Barrier that lasts 15 and impedes movement of ground units. Massive units will shatter Force Fields on contact.
Tooltip.ruRU: Barrier that lasts 15 and impedes movement of ground units. Massive units will shatter Force Fields on contact.

Tooltip.enUS: Creates a range 4.5 aura that reduces incoming ranged damage to friendly units by 2. Lasts 23.
Tooltip.ruRU: Creates a range 4 aura that reduces incoming ranged damage to friendly units by 2. Lasts 15.

Tooltip.enUS: Creates hallucinations that cannot use active abilities, cannot deal damage, and die more easily. Hallucinations last 60 seconds. Enemy detectors reveal hallucinations.
Tooltip.ruRU: Creates hallucinations that cannot use active abilities, cannot deal damage, and die more easily. Hallucinations last 60 seconds. Enemy detectors reveal hallucinations.

Tooltip.enUS: These hallucinated copies function like the original unit, but they cannot use active abilities, deal damage, warp in structures, or gather resources, and they die more easily. Hallucinations last 60 before they disappear.
Tooltip.ruRU: These hallucinated copies function like the original unit, but they cannot use active abilities, deal damage, warp in structures, or gather resources, and they die more easily. Hallucinations last 60 before they disappear.

Tooltip.enUS: These hallucinated copies function like the original unit, but they cannot use active abilities, cannot deal damage, and die more easily. Hallucinations last 60 before they disappear.
Tooltip.ruRU: These hallucinated copies function like the original unit, but they cannot use active abilities, cannot deal damage, and die more easily. Hallucinations last 60 before they disappear.

Tooltip.enUS: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Tooltip.ruRU: Отменить текущий приказ и отдать следующий.
